sentence.Network_en: Why make a whole village prisoner if it was not to some nefarious purpose?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不是出于某种恶毒的目的，为什么把整村人囚禁起来？

sentence.Network_en: My father believes you all have a nefarious purpose here.
sentence.Network_cn: 我父亲认为你们都有邪恶的目的.

sentence.Network_en: He was universally feared because of his many nefarious deeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为他干了许多罪恶的勾当,所以人人都惧怕他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... nefarious 极恶毒的>不应受责备的/善良的 nefarious 邪恶的>模范的 nervy 勇敢>缺乏自信.
OG上的SAT填空题 - 小马过河 ... strategy 策略谋略 nefarious 邪恶的, 穷凶极恶的 conscientious 本着良心的，负责的.
《GMAT600分词汇》第三课 ... necromancy n.巫术；通灵术 nefarious a.恶毒的；极坏的 nepotism n.重用亲戚；裙带关系.
《GMAT600分词汇》第三课 ... necromancy n.巫术；通灵术 nefarious a.恶毒的；极坏的 nepotism n.重用亲戚；裙带关系.

list.abs: they are scheming to execute all manner of nefarious deeds asbid to hold on or destroy you ones , meaning the planet and its inhabitants .他们诡计多端地施行一切邪恶行径，苟延残喘着，或者试图去毁灭你们——意思是这个星球及其居民。
he was universally feared because of his many nefarious deeds .因为他干了许多罪恶的勾当，所以人人都惧怕他。
he was universally feared because of his many nefarious deeds .因为他干了许多罪恶的勾当，所以人人都惧怕他。
I hated the train stations , full of dubious men hovering vast quantities of nefarious substances up their noses .我讨厌这里的火车站，里面满是形迹可疑的人，个个鼻子里吸着大量的有毒的物质。
A former " infidel dog " says nefarious corporations are running the planet ., 一只前 " 不信神的狗 " 说 , 邪恶的公司正在跑行星.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin nefarius, from nefas, nefar- 'wrong' (from ne- 'not' + fas 'divine law') + -ous

entry.def: If you describe an activity as nefarious, you mean that it is wicked and immoral.

example.ex: Why make a whole village prisoner if it was not to some nefarious purpose?
example.tran: 如果不是出于某种恶毒的目的，为什么把整村人囚禁起来？

auth_sentence.content: They erase all memories and evidence of their nefarious activities.

auth_sentence.content: That doesn't mean the reasons for this are nefarious.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That doesn't mean the reasons for this are nefarious.

auth_sentence.content: Southerners regarded Brown as part of a nefarious Northern plot.
